attributes.title: Do not get
attributes.review: Now I am not part of the gen z take this app  of the App Store I just got this app to support president 🍊orange 🍊 and after it took forever to download 🕐🕑🕒🕓🕔🕕🕖🕗🕘🕙🕚🕛 it immediately asked me for my 📞 phone number 📞 which I thought was weird because president 🍊orange 🍊 has a wife and kids 👨‍👩‍👦 🧍‍♂️🧍‍♀️🧍 so I thought he would never 🙅‍♂️ cheat.

I was curious to see what this app was about, even though I’m not usually into politics. I download the app and it crashes already. All I wanted to do was see the orange guy but I can’t I love testing out apps but this is by far one of the most frustrating for me. I had jsut downloaded it and crashed I am very frustrated.

attributes.title: YOU’LL NEVER BELIEVE
attributes.review: i am disgusted and horrified for APPLE to have this such app i downloaded it and what i first saw caused me trauma and now cause of it i go to therapy and get nightmares of what i saw i cant even figure out such words to put together to explain my experience i am flustered ! 🤬 this app should NOT be on the app store what if MY KIDS SEE THIS APP THEY WILL BE TRAUMATIZED NO ONE WANTS LITTLE KIDS TO BE SCARED 😔 !!!! delete the app❤️

attributes.title: Not even one star
attributes.review: Its a shame. Our delightful president has made an app and it's just full of spam. I heard that the Generation Z kids are trying to take this down, and i can understand why. It's a horrible slow working app. I in no way agree with the horrible CULT of Generation Z but they are right on this one. Bad app Trump. Sorry.

attributes.title: America’s biggest mistake
attributes.review: This app is so bad that it makes every other app slightly better just by existing. It not only took 2 months to download, but when it did it opened to show the scariest thing I had ever seen, but then I just realized it was our president. Nobody get this app you will greatly regret it!

attributes.title: No thank it’s bad
attributes.review: Pls give this app 1 star because if this app gets deleted TikTok won’t!! 😁❤️so I would ask for a 1 star because trump is so mean he only wants us to be miserable because we are in quarantine and he just wants to take away things we love like TikTok and roblox so pls write a 1 star review on official trump 2020 app pls and thank u we must save TikTok!!

attributes.title: This app is trash 🤬😡🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app gives you notifications and it spams you also need to put your own privacy and you need to put your phone number and the app lies a app should not make you put your information just for stupid nonsense information a good app should let you sign up. Period

attributes.title: Beep bot💖
attributes.review: This has nothing to do with zed app,but it has a ton of things to do with our fugly orange president 🍊🥰 it is extremely terrifying to see him upon my screen screeching “trump 2020” 🤢 it’s appalling to know that the orange heathen yelling at me!!🍊It’s scary,but I have slowly had my innocents taken away from this orange beech🍊! Tik tok matters not our orange,sexist,and racist president!Save our innocence and community!🍊

PARENTS MUST READ

Before downloading I would like you to know that this is one of the most toxic apps in the world. Nothing is great about it. My child came up to me crying and said she wanted to delete it right after she downloaded it. There is no good in downloading this app.

Remember everyone, all apps matter. (🤮 except this one)

attributes.title: why
attributes.review: I got this app hoping to learn more about the 2020 campaign of our ✨wonderful ✨ orange 🍊 but the dang darn app took 4 weeks to download and frankly that is just unacceptable after waiting the 4 weeks I opened the app to find enormous font that looked like it was made for OLD PEOPLE are you kidding me!!!!!!! that huge font made my young eyes hurt I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP
